name: Mirage (itch) (gubebra)
description:
Experience made in 2 weeks to study rendering portal techniques to run in low end hardware like VR. I plan on releasing a pc version as well in the future, for now, you can play using HTC VIVE. This game is meant to be played walking in your room in a 4m x 2m play space.

If you do not have a VR equipment, you can watch the whole gameplay here:

This game was made in collaboration with Marina Bedeschi @3d.mari (instagram).

Assets taken from another sites:

  • https://freesound.org/people/Erokia/sounds/460578/
  • https://sketchfab.com/3d-models/technorama-reverspective-b49966662b0948f89e024b6d0e5288fb
  • https://sketchfab.com/3d-models/magic-crystal-bw-871e40e7271d4db28fe466bf32598d8a
  • https://sketchfab.com/3d-models/fiesta-tea-8bde490c80444157b4545471d067423c
  • https://sketchfab.com/3d-models/cloud-station-26f81b24d83441ba88c7e80a52adbaaf
